body_html:
What if if I need to apply weights to each different elements in each training sample?
Why not have an element-wise loss function, with parameter to control whether to use mean or not?
body_text:
What if if I need to apply weights to each different elements in each training sample?
Why not have an element-wise loss function, with parameter to control whether to use mean or not?
body:
What if if I need to apply weights to each different elements in each training sample? 
Why not have an element-wise loss function, with parameter to control whether to use mean or not?
